name: RPG Maker MZ Project
developer_name: Gotcha Gotcha Games, KADOKAWA, Yoji Ojima

screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .rmmzproject file in RPG Maker MZ
screenshot.caption: RMMZPROJECT file open in RPG Maker MZ

description: RPG Maker is a series of PC-based RPG creation tools that allow gamers to design, play, and distribute their own RPGs. RPG Maker MZ is the ninth entry in the series; it was released in 2020.

Different versions of RPG Maker save project files in different file formats. RPG Maker MZ saves project files as RMMZPROJECT files. Each RMMZPROJECT file contains information that allows RPG Maker MZ to load that game creation project and its included assets, such as maps, sprites, sounds, and game logic.
RPG Maker MZ typically saves RMMZPROJECT files in a directory created specifically to hold a game creation project and its assets. In Windows, these directories are located at:

common_filenames.description: Game.rmmzproject - The default name RPG Maker MZ assigns to projects.
